$:/plugins/kookma/solution/readme.title: $:/plugins/kookma/solution/readme
$:/plugins/kookma/solution/readme.text:
; Solution plugin
There are many questions and answers in [[TW Google forum|https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/tiddlywiki]], some of them shows elegant solution to raised questions and worth to be documented in a manner to be accessible easily later on.

Solution is a small plugin to create solution tiddlers. It adds a button to page controls, on click, creates a tiddler tagged with `solution`, contains `keywords`, `responder`, and `url` fields. It then uses a view template to show the `responder` (author), reference post (`url`), and the `keywords` in a semantic way.

The `keywords` field acts like tags, so, clicking on them shows a list of all tiddlers tagged with this keyword or has this keyword in its `keywords` field.

; Code and demo
For learning plugin features, syntax, tutorial and examples see the plugin demo and code pages

* Demo: https://kookma.github.io/TW-Solution/
* Code: https://github.com/kookma/TW-Solution

$:/plugins/kookma/solution/stylesheet/he.title: $:/plugins/kookma/solution/stylesheet/header-segment

$:/plugins/kookma/solution/template/keyw.title: $:/plugins/kookma/solution/template/keywords
$:/plugins/kookma/solution/template/keyw.text:
\define keywords-body(kwd)
<$list filter="[tag[$kwd$]] [search:keywords[$kwd$]]" variable="itemTid">
<$link to=<<itemTid>> ><$text text=<<itemTid>>/></$link>
</$list>
\end
<!-- keywords-body lists all tiddler tagged with kwd or have kwd in their keywords field -->

<$set name="transclusion" value=<<qualify "$:/state/popup/tag">> >
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible sl-keywords" popup=<<transclusion>> >
<$text text=<<currentTiddler>>/>
</$button>
<$reveal state=<<transclusion>> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes" class="tc-drop-down">
<$link to=<<currentTiddler>> ><$text text=<<currentTiddler>>/></$link>
<hr>
<$macrocall $name="keywords-body" kwd=<<currentTiddler>> />
</$reveal>
</$set>

''Keywords'': <$list filter={{!!keywords}} template="$:/plugins/kookma/solution/template/keywords" />
